name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;; Gravesoll Port, a town filled with skilled sailors and markets with peculiar goods,{w} bustles with life both day and night.{w} Travelers entering the port can smell the ocean on the breeze,{w} hear the laughter of the children,{w} and partake in the music festivals being held.;;;hint
speak;; Though, in these turbulent and unstable times,{w} how long can this little corner of jubilance survive...?;;;hint
speak;Caroline; Up here should be the port town of Gravesoll.{w} I've never been myself,{w} but I've heard tell of their markets and festivals.
speak;Emma; After days of fighting and running, that would be beyond amazing.
speak;Emma; I'm in the perfect mood to eat and dance all day!
speak;Sarah; Just a reminder that we're here to meet Kate and the Dawn Brigade.{w} The celebrations can happen after convincing her to join us.
speak;Caroline; Trust me, I haven't forgotten.{w} I would like to show my daughter the beauty and joy out in the world, though.
speak;Sarah; It's a commendable endeavor,{w} though your timing leaves something to be desired{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Maybe, but when your home burns down,{w} you have to make some sudden and unexpected choices.{w} Perhaps you shouldn't make judgements on things you don't fully understand.
speak;Sarah; I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean to-
speak;Emma; How about we all calm down?{w} Mom, I'm sure Sarah didn't mean anything negative from her comment.{w} We're all just a little tense after having to leave our homes behind.
speak;Sarah; Yes, maybe I was a little{tgm}...{tgm} insensitive in my jest.
speak;Emma; Don't worry, we're all a team now.{w} We've got to stick together!
speak;Sarah; It seems I was right about you.{w} You're already looking to be a better leader than I am now.
speak;Emma; Oh please, Sarah, don't be{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Wait{tgm}...{tgm}{w}{c:bop_portrait;Emma}is that smoke in the sky?
speak;Caroline; I see flames at the port town!{w} Everyone, get down while we move in!{w} We don't want whoever is attacking to notice us!
speak;Emma; The demon army{tgm}...{tgm} Why{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Why are they here?{w} Did they{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Emma, don't lose your composure.{w} We need to see if we can rescue any{tgm}...{tgm}any survivors{tgm}...
speak;Sarah; The burning houses{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The corpses everywhere{tgm}...{tgm}{w} And the smell{tgm}...
speak;Emma; This is just like our village all over again{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Crap, she alerted the enemies!{w} Everyone, get ready for combat!
speak;Luna; Oh gods, what have we done to deserve the trials before us{tgm}...?{tgm}{w} What is happening to us?{w} How could such abominations walk our lands?
speak;Carlos; ...{tgm}And yet you're still here?{w} I thought you said you'd be flying off minutes ago.;no_talk
speak;Luna; D-don't tease me at a time like this!
speak;Luna; You know the demons frighten me!
speak;Carlos; Then why did you volunteer to fight?{w} If you're too scared, just wait for your sister to come back.
speak;Luna; I-I can go out there by myself!
speak;Carlos; Luna, your legs are literally shaking right now.{w} If you want to prove to Kate you're not just a little girl,{w} your time to go is <bconvo>now</>.
speak;Kate; Excuse me?!{w} Who is letting who out?!
speak;Kate; Luna, you are <bconvo>not</> leaving this house.{w} You're not ready.
speak;Luna; Sis, pleeeease let me prove myself!{w} I can't sit here and let everyone else fight while I watch.

speak;Kate; Yes, you can, and that's final.{w} I saw a group of people coming, and I will go out there and get their attention myself.{w} Carlos, you're in charge until I return.{w} Don't you <bconvo>dare</> let Luna leave.{w} I'll come back to let you know what our next move is.
speak;Carlos; So{tgm}...{tgm}are you going out there or what?
speak;Carlos; Kate said I was in charge while she's gone,{w} which means I make the calls.
speak;Luna; You know she's going to knock our heads together later, right?
speak;Carlos; Which is why we should make this worth it, yeah?{w} Now, come on, go protect your big sister.{w} Just like you tried to back then.
speak;Luna; It's time to go and make myself useful!
speak;Luna; No time to sit around!
speak;Emma; A survivor! Who are you?{w} Why are the demons at the port?{w} Are you the only survivor?
speak;Sarah; Calm yourself, Emma.{w} That would be Kate.
speak;Emma; The leader of the Dawn Brigade?!

speak;Kate; At least, I lead what's left of it.{w} These demons came out of nowhere and took us by surprise.{w} They somehow got past our scouts without a trace.{w} We failed to keep the townspeople safe, and now,{w} those reanimated corpses out there{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Reanimated corpses{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Like what happened in my town.{w} Don't worry, we're here to help you guys out.
speak;Kate; I see that you have Sarah with you.{w} You have my trust, then, for now.{w} Come on, my sister and tactician are waiting in a house nearby.
speak;Kate; How do you know them?!
speak;Sarah; I told them, of course.{w} They wanted to meet you all as well,{w} so we could negotiate plans to reorganize our groups.
speak;Kate; Hmph, we'll see about that.{w} Come on, I've got to check back on my sister.
speak;Emma; Oh, is she the one flying towards us?
speak;Kate; Luna!!!{w} I told you both to stay in the house!

speak;Luna; I ain't staying at the house and waiting for you to come back again!{w} I'm staying here no matter what you say, sis!{w} It's time for me to have your back!{w} I've been able to do it before!

speak;Kate; Ugh, fine!{w} Just stay close behind me.{w} The demons are coming and I don't have time to escort you back safely.{w} But I'm giving you an earful later.{w} Both you and{tgm}...{tgm}Carlos{tgm}...{tgm}{w} He'd better pick a god and pray{tgm}...
